meaningMnemonic: I say my <kanji>commandment</kanji> in order <vocabulary>to warn</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>to caution</vocabulary> the people not to do bad things.
readingMnemonic: The first commandment I say <vocabulary>to warn</vocabulary> them of not doing bad things is <reading>I mash</reading> (いまし) my own potatoes. Nobody else mashes my potatoes. Got it?
